channel.title: VitalizePK 614! Need staff! Join now!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dCLDd9V.png[/img] [B]Introduction;[/B] It's been a while since Vitalize was online, we were previously a 317 but times were hard which led to the closure of the server unfortunately. The 614 has been in development for many weeks and I hope all problems are at a minimum so you guys can have a fun and enjoyable experience. If you're a previous Vitalize member and you have some sort of proof then I'll be more than happy to give you veteran rank. The new Vitalize is ALL - PvP, after some thought and consideration the idea of PvM has been scrapped due to it playing too low of a part in a master and spawn server. To replace this we've included content that fits in perfectly with a PvP server; Mini-games such as Duel arena, Fight pits etc. If you're looking for a relaxed and friendly environment & community to fight your friends in then this is the perfect server for you! [B]Links;[/B] > [url=http://vitalizepk.com/]Home Page[/url]> [url=http://vitalizepk.com/forums]Forums[/url]> [url=http://vitalizepk.com/webclient.php]Webclient[/url]> [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/36288851/Vitalize614.jar]Desktop Client[/url][/CENTER] [b]Features;[/b]
[ul][*]Loyalty Titles[*]Flawless Switching[*]Enchant Combat[*]Clean Client[*]Fight Pits[*]Duel Arena[*]Registered Domain[*]Purchased vBulletin Forums[*]Server & Forums updated frequently[*]Friendly community[*]Various PK teleports[/ul]
[CENTER][b]Media;[/b] Sick of seeing the same G.E home on every 614? So are we that's why our home is located in the nicely laid out Yanille. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/52bTWk2.png[/img] Various ways to teleport around; our newests being Lumber yard method.[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/k9Y2Zqq.png[/img] Clan wars will be taking place here; Working on a system that counts how many users are taking part to stop people coming back to make it fair.[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qL1TJNh.png[/img] There aren't a lot of images you can show off with a PK server, CHECK IT OUT if you want a live demo;)[/CENTER]

item.title: VitalizePK 614! Need staff! Join now!
item.dc:creator: @Fenn Fenn
item.description:
@Fenn wrote:

[CENTER]
Introduction;
It’s been a while since Vitalize was online, we were previously a 317 but times were hard which led to the closure of the server unfortunately. The 614 has been in development for many weeks and I hope all problems are at a minimum so you guys can have a fun and enjoyable experience. If you’re a previous Vitalize member and you have some sort of proof then I’ll be more than happy to give you veteran rank. The new Vitalize is ALL - PvP, after some thought and consideration the idea of PvM has been scrapped due to it playing too low of a part in a master and spawn server. To replace this we’ve included content that fits in perfectly with a PvP server; Mini-games such as Duel arena, Fight pits etc. If you’re looking for a relaxed and friendly environment & community to fight your friends in then this is the perfect server for you!
Links;

Home Page> Forums> Webclient> Desktop Client[/CENTER]
Features;

[ul][]Loyalty Titles[]Flawless Switching[]Enchant Combat[]Clean Client[]Fight Pits[]Duel Arena[]Registered Domain[]Purchased vBulletin Forums[]Server & Forums updated frequently[]Friendly community[*]Various PK teleports[/ul]

[CENTER]Media;
Sick of seeing the same G.E home on every 614? So are we that’s why our home is located in the nicely laid out Yanille.

52bTWk2.png758×498

Various ways to teleport around; our newests being Lumber yard method.
k9Y2Zqq.png758×498

Clan wars will be taking place here; Working on a system that counts how many users are taking part to stop people coming back to make it fair.
qL1TJNh.png758×498

There aren’t a lot of images you can show off with a PK server, CHECK IT OUT if you want a live demo;)[/CENTER]

Read full topic
